name: Midnight Trigger
description:
Midnight Trigger is a 2D Top-down shooter set in the modern day where magic and technology co-exist. You play as a bounty hunter working for an organization that offers all sorts of services. Most of them illegal. Using both magical abilities and  the newest technologies, these hunters will do whatever it takes to satisfy the client's desires. As long as the money is there. 

This version is still a demo of the game.
